xierpa3.constants.constants module¶

class xierpa3.constants.constants.Constants¶

Bases: xierpa3.constants.config.COPYTO_config.Config

Inherited by main Xierpa3 classes, to share default constants, will allowing to be redefined by inheriting classes.
